20110112004653.000|20110112004654.000|CC1|BLOOD PRESSURE IN YOUNG         
20110112004654.000|20110112004655.000|CC1|CHILDREN.

20110112004659.000|20110112004700.000|CC1|HIGHER BLOOD PRESSURE.          
20110112004700.000|20110112004701.000|CC1|THAT RISK WAS INDEPENDENT OF    
20110112004701.000|20110112004703.000|CC1|OTHER RISK FACTORS LIKE         
20110112004703.000|20110112004705.000|CC1|WEIGHT OR FAMILY HISTORY.       
20110112004705.000|20110112004707.000|CC1|EXPERTS SAY QUITTING            
20110112004707.000|20110112004709.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY BENEFITS PARENTS      
20110112004709.000|20110112004711.000|CC1|BUT THEIR KIDS' HEALTH MAY      
20110112004711.000|20110112004714.000|CC1|GIVE THEM ADDED MOTIVATION.     
20110112004714.000|20110112004716.000|CC1|>> AND SITTING FOR LONG         
20110112004716.000|20110112004717.000|CC1|PERIODS OF TIME COULD PUT       
20110112004717.000|20110112004719.000|CC1|YOU AT A HIGHER RISK FOR        
20110112004719.000|20110112004722.000|CC1|HIGH CHOLESTEROL AND WEIGHT     
20110112004722.000|20110112004722.000|CC1|GAIN.

20110112004730.000|20110112004732.000|CC1|HAD LOWER CHOLESTEROL AND
